topic.title: ARConnect Interface (MCIP)

body.p: ARConnect is a collection of system components that provides efficient inter-core communications, interrupt distribution, debug assistance, and other inter-core functionality in a multicore system. ARConnect is used to integrate two ARC-EM11D cores into a dual-core system that can be used to run applications such as Bluetooth Low-Energy stack and audio pipeline stream processing applications.
